en: He is torn by doubts.
He wrote a biography of a famous poet.
He bought eggs and milk from a farmer.
He is clever in some ways.
He says he has achieved his goal to a certain extent.
ko: 걔는 목표를 어느 정도는 달성했다고 하더라고.

en: You can trust him to some degree but not wholly.
ko: 걔를 어느 정도는 믿어도 되지만 다 믿지는 마.

en: He left Japan on a fine day.
ko: 걔 날씨 좋은 날 일본을 떠났어.

en: He was tormented by some deep sorrow.
He had a certain charm.
He bought an English book at a bookstore.
ko: 걔 서점에서 영어 책 한 권 샀어.

en: He worked for a rich man.
He keeps company with a foreign student.
He is right in a sense.
He is in a sense a representative of his company.
ko: 어떤 면에서 걔는 자기 회사의 대표 격이야.
